channel.title: EditorConfig on ZEN
channel.description: Recent content in EditorConfig on ZEN

item.title: EditorConfig配置
item.description: EditorConfig 主页 相关说明 When opening a file, EditorConfig plugins look for a file named .editorconfig in the directory of the opened file and in every parent directory. A search for .editorconfig files will stop if the root filepath is reached or an EditorConfig file with root=true is found. For Windows Users: To create an .editorconfig file within Windows Explorer, you need to create a file named
